UCLA offers an extensive selection of K-12 educational programs and resources, many free of charge. Young learners can attend classes ranging from writing workshops through Hammer Kids to creating masks and other artwork at Fowler Kids in the Courtyard. There are extensive enrichment opportunities for teachers, as well. With this assortment of programs,
